snippet: President Maithripala Sirisena pardoned a former Tamil Tiger insurgent accused of conspiring to kill him 10 years ago.
abstract: Sri Lankan Pres Maithripala Sirisena pardons former Tamil Tiger Sivaraja Jenivan, man detained since 2005 for conspiring to assassinate him.
lead_paragraph: President Maithripala Sirisena pardoned a former Tamil Tiger insurgent accused of conspiring to kill him 10 years ago.

headline.main: Sri Lanka: Leader Frees Man Jailed in Plot to Kill Him
headline.print_headline: Asia; Sri Lanka: Leader Frees Man Jailed in Plot to Kill Him
